original: Lundberg, Fritz Holger, direktör, Tranås, f. 30/3/83 i Norrköp. av verk-mäst. August L. o. Josefina Maria Andersson. G. 1. m. Alva Tidblom, d. 32; 2. m. Gunborg Lövenfeldt; 3. m. Judith Köhler. Barn: Gudrun f. 15, Bengt 16. — Verkst. dir. f. A-B Fritz Lundbergs Pälsvaruindustrier i Tranås. Fd. led. av stadsfullm., dess be-redn:utsk. o. lönendn. RVO, ProPGM.
translated: Lundberg, Fritz Holger, director, Tranås, b. 30/3/83 in Norrköp. son of mechanic August L. and Josefina Maria Andersson. 1st marriage with Alva Tidblom, died in 1932; 2nd marriage with Gunborg Lövenfeldt; 3rd marriage with Judith Köhler. Children: Gudrun b. 1915, Bengt b. 1916. Former managing director of A-B Fritz Lundbergs Pälsvaruindustrier in Tranås. Former member of the city council, its preparation committee and salary committee. Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa, Member of the Swedish Pro Patria Medal Society.
